name: 黃乾怡
objective: This course addresses Taguchi's quality engineering approach and intelligent parameter design to improve product quality and process performance. Using the method can significantly reduce the defect rate in the manufacturing process, reduce the production cost, and improve the quality and reliability of the product.
schedule:
Week 1 Robust Design
Week 2 Experimental Design Brief
Week 3 Orthogonal Array/Linear Graph
Week 4 Principle of Quality Engineering
Week 5 Quality loss function & SN ratio
Week 6 Parameter Design  (Dynamic Characteristics)
Week 7 Parameter Design 
Week 8 Tolerance Design
Week 9 Parameter Design Using Computational Intelligence (Mahalanobis Distance)
Week 10 invited speaker
Week 11~ 17 Journal paper review (oral presentation)
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Oral presentation 30%
Final Exam 40%
Attendance & Performance 30%
materials: Quality Engineering – Off-line methods and applications by Chao-ton Su
